publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3644 John Scott: Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Ayr Rugby Football Club on clinching the premiership division 1 title following its 20-10 win over Edinburgh Academical Football Club on Saturday 7 March 2009 and sends best wishes to 1st XV coach Kenny Murray and to all the players and supporters of Ayr Rugby Football Club.
S3M-3644 Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club (lodged on 9 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3644 Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club (lodged on 9 March 2009) Elizabeth Smith*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Aitken*, Bob Doris*, Jamie McGrigor*, Cathy Jamieson*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-3644 Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club (lodged on 9 March 2009) Bill Butler*, Ross Finnie*, Margaret Mitchell*

S3M-3644 John Scott: Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Ayr Rugby Football Club on clinching the premiership division 1 title following its 20-10 win over Edinburgh Academical Football Club on Saturday 7 March 2009 and sends best wishes to 1st XV coach Kenny Murray and to all the players and supporters of Ayr Rugby Football Club. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Elizabeth Smith, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Aitken, Bob Doris, Jamie McGrigor, Cathy Jamieson, Mary Scanlon, Bill Butler, Ross Finnie, Margaret Mitchell, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3644 Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club (lodged on 9 March 2009) Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-3644 Congratulations to Ayr Rugby Football Club (lodged on 9 March 2009) Angela Constance*
